small.description: Small project (100 files) should complete in < 500ms with < 30 MB RSS growth

medium.description: Medium project (1k files) should complete in < 3s with < 80 MB RSS growth

large.description: Large project (10k files) should complete in < 30s with < 350 MB RSS growth (total < 500 MB)

notes.durationMeasurement: Wall-clock time from walk start to last file yielded (ms)
notes.regressionPolicy: A build fails if measured metric exceeds budget by more than regressionThresholdPercent
notes.totalMemoryTarget: Process target from CLAUDE.md is < 500 MB total RSS; delta budget of 350 MB leaves headroom for the ~150 MB baseline
